data.title: Matthew Allen Gillespie
data.meta_description: 1980-2024  Matthew Allen Gillespie, 43, of East Liverpool, passed away on Tuesday, June 11, 2024. He was born on June 25, 1980, in East Liverpool, a son of Timo
data.text:
Matthew Allen Gillespie, 43, of East Liverpool, passed away on Tuesday, June 11, 2024. He was born on June 25, 1980, in East Liverpool, a son of Timothy Gillespie of East Liverpool and Colleen (Twiford) Gillespie of Newell.

Besides his parents, he is survived by three sons, Preston and Gage Gillespie, both of East Liverpool, and Sebastian Gillespie of Columbiana; two daughters, Makayla and Gracee Gillespie, both of East Liverpool. He is also survived by four brothers, Ryan and Jayden Gillespie, both of East Liverpool, and Phillip Metsch of West Virginia and Anthony (Carly) Metsch of Wellsville; a sister, Kayla Gillespie of East Liverpool; and paternal grandfather, Kenneth Gillespie of New Cumberland.

Friends and family will be received on Saturday, June 15, 2024 from 4 p.m. until time of service at 7 p.m. at the Nixon Funeral Home of Newell.

6/14/24
